programme.title: New Doraemon Ep146
programme.desc: Siri terbaharu Doraemon, sebuah kucing robot bersama Nobita serta rakan-rakannya dalam menjalani kehidupan harian yang penuh aksi yang melucukan.

programme.title: Ultraman Z Ep23
programme.desc: Haruki Natsukawan ialah seorang juruterbang di unit robot Global Allied Forces Japan 'STORAGE'. Semasa Haruki bekerja untuk menjaga keamanan di Bumi, seorang Ultra Hero muncul iaitu Ultraman Z. Z

programme.title: SMK Musim 3 Ep05
programme.desc: Puan Bariah hilang sabar dengan sikap pelajarnya. Geng SMK sedar Puan Bariah tidak seperti dulu dan semakin garang. Zizi didenda dan dia merancang untuk menjadi Pengetua untuk membalas dendam!

programme.title: Power Rangers Dino Charge S22 Ep14
programme.desc: Apabila tiga Rangers terperangkap di sebuah kubur bawah tanah, Chase berusaha untuk menguasai kuasanya sebelum terlambat.

programme.title: Supa Strikas S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Sebelum pertembungan Technicali, Shakes mendedahkan rahsianya... The Zone. Tetapi Shakes mendapati dirinya di twilight zone apabila jurulatih mengaturkan latihan realiti maya untuk mencari sumber The Zone.

programme.title: Ultraman Z Ep10
programme.desc: Haruki Natsukawan ialah seorang juruterbang di unit robot Global Allied Forces Japan 'STORAGE'. Semasa Haruki bekerja untuk menjaga keamanan di Bumi, seorang Ultra Hero muncul iaitu Ultraman Z. Z

programme.title: TVP@TTV Sains Tahun 4 Ep01

programme.title: Ultraman Zero The Chronicles HD Ep18

programme.title: Ismi Solehah Ep05
programme.desc: Solehah dapat kawan baru, namanya Puteri tapi perangai sama macam raksasa. Macam macam Solehah dan keluarganya buat untuk Puteri. Apa agaknya yang akan terjadi kepada persahabatan Solehah dengan Puteri?

programme.title: Himpunan Kisah dari Al-Quran Ep02
programme.desc: Cerita ringkas dan padat dengan nasihat dan teladan yang diambil dari sumber Al-Quran yang dihoskan oleh Diana Amir dan berinteraksi dengan watak-watak puppets (Mel, Nom, Achu dan Yuyu).

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fusion Ep23

programme.title: Karya 12-Lampu Merah

programme.title: Musnahkan Pelamin Anganku

programme.title: Senario Asam Garam

programme.title: Tentang Bulan

programme.title: Artis Lari Culik Pengantin Lah Pulak

programme.title: Tuan Petri Saadong Ep01

programme.title: Trilogy of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: It's three times the substance, style and stars, in this amazing motion picture featuring the work of three of Shaw Brother's finest martial arts directors.

programme.title: Facets of Love
programme.desc: In this king of epic dramas, three sexy vignettes are set against a Ming Dynasty brothel that steams with erotic myths, secret trysts and pleasurable twists.

programme.title: Moods of Love
programme.desc: How far would you go for love? Or lust? These are the questions posed in two, sinfully entertaining Sung Dynasty tales that comprise this film.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: With a focus on the pampered teenaged Jia Bao Yu, believed to be of supernatural origins, this Chinese classic depicts the Jia family's rise and fall.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: Veteran Yueh Feng made this 'Martial Arts World' saga of a masked master of the 'Black Sand Hand Technique,' starring Lily Ho in a dual role.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: Michael Hui Kwun-Man makes a hilarious film debut as the nuttiest warlord of early 20th Century China! Also stars Lily Ho, Hu Chin and Tina Ti.

programme.title: Let's Fall in Love
programme.desc: Pressured by his parents to marry prior to taking over his father's business, Guan rejects every girl they find but then, he stumbles upon the perfect one?

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: In one of her first roles, 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' villain Cheng Pei Pei plays a kung-fu Nancy Drew who must face a secret serial killer.

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: After a bride-to-be is discovered to be possessed, justice must be done and an exorcism performed before anyone can rest in peace.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: This heartwarming 1963 musical from Shaw Brothers tells the tale of a beautiful shepherdess, whose own problems drag her into a love triangle.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: Seven seductive Spiders lie in wait for our faithful heroes in the third installment of the Shaw Brothers adaptation of Journey to the West.

programme.title: The Kid With the Golden Arm
programme.desc: Director Chang Cheh reunites the Five Venoms in his second biggest cult hit in the West, featuring Lo Meng's most memorable performance.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Chiang Li Ping plays a scorned wife, while Elaine Chin Yen Ling is the mistress who teaches the hypocritical husband that what goes around, comes around.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: When Fang returns from the U.S. to see Rose but starts eyeing her old friend's fiance, Rose shows that she has a thorny side.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: A virtuous lone swordsman who is not without individual weaknesses (Ti Lung) finally decides that it's payback time.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung woos a famous courtesan, indulges in some gambling and helps out earthquake victims while incognito in Suzhou.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: Chang Cheh presents his epic vision of the Temple, featuring his favourite leads Ti Lung, David Chiang and Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: Betty Loh, Grace Ting and Diana Chang star in this romantic comedy between a gifted scholar and the administrative official's daughter he falls for at first sight.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Legendary director Chang Cheh teams Alexander Fu Sheng and 'Venoms' Lo Meng and Kuo Chue in an exciting tale of a kung fu blacksmith.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Directed by the legendary Chang Cheh, this rousing tale presents a fictional account of the famous Italian explorer's adventures.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: A young woman's life turns tragic after she discovers that she's adopted and then goes in search of her real mother.

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: This fascinating story of conflicting clans marks the beginning of Sun Chung's exploration of the kung fu genre.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This drama takes on a group of young people who get entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: After a master passes on his magical weapon to his top student, a jealous rival goes and kidnaps the man's fiance.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: Cheng Pei Pei stars as Hsiao-Yun, a young singer struggling to juggle her career and her relationship with her pianist lover.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: Ultimate combat is in the offing after King Eagle Chan Fei learns that Hung Ching Tien murdered their chief in a power struggle.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Kung fu idols Wang Yu, Lo Meng and Loh Lieh star in this comedy set in a Shaolin temple where Hung Hsi-kuan and Fang Shih-yu become disciples.

programme.title: Ready o/r Knot
programme.desc: A couple who first meet at a wedding & have been together for five years, question the institution of marriage from opposing viewpoints. Should marriage always be the 'next step.'?

programme.title: Happiness
programme.desc: Depicting a bond between a teen & a woman suffering from Alzheimer's, Kara Hui & Carlos Chan won the 2015 MIFF Best Actress & Best Supporting Actor awards.

programme.title: Dr. Wai in the Scripture with No Words
programme.desc: Golden Horse Award winner for 'Best Visual Effects, this saga captures how a race begins when a former antiquarian goes in search of the lost, coveted Scripture with No Words.

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Starring Huang Xuan & Liu Hao Ran, this winner of five awards tells the legend of a demon cat who disrupts the peace during the Tang Dynasty, causing a series of strange events.
After Mo Wan lost his true love, he is numb to other women. One day, he writes a story titled '2046', about a room that never changes, where people go to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: This Thai horror flick depicts how a high school student dies during an abortion - and returns to haunt the apartment where she used to live.

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes
programme.desc: Two cops stumble upon a conspiracy in the wake of the death of a girl accused of 'stealing bullets.'Risking their own lives, they set out to solve the mystery.

programme.title: The Yuppie Fantasia 3
programme.desc: Challenges in Leung Foon's life turn him into a chauvinist who hates himself. However, the arrival of his daughter spells a second chance at redemption.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: As business at his boxing studio begins to falter, Kit Fok, an unbeaten underground fighter, must take on a final match against an intimidating adversary to keep it alive.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: An awkward young beauty enchants her outgoing classmate. Unfortunately, she falls in love with a someone else instead and decides to quietly pursue him.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: Tat Ming Cheung meets a mysterious girl who takes him back in time to the Qing dynasty, where he rises to the role of famed judge Sung Sai Kit and restores justice to the land.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: A woman is left by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. While finding her feet in her father's restaurant, she gets attracted to the new chef, a free spirit who helps liberate her.

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: Director John Woo gathers Chinese, Japanese & Korean superstars - Zhang Han Yu, Masaharu Fukuyama & Ha Ji Won - in this remake of the classic crime thriller.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: Produced by megastar Jay Chou, this drama starring Will Liu & Wang Jun Kai depicts how a former top team racing driver's focus on proving himself leads to his team's downfall.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When four employees decide to sign up for their company's new Dragon Boat team, a life-changing challenge waits up ahead.

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: This Jackie Chan-produced sci-fi thriller revolves around a scientist who frantically sends herself back in time to save her son. Starring Yang Mi & Wallace Huo.

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: In a small Chinese village, where an illegal trade in human blood has caused the spread of HIV, two people dying of AIDS risk their all for love & a last chance at happiness.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2018
programme.desc: In this remake of John Woo's legendary production, a former drug smuggler tries to repair his relationship with his estranged brother, an up-and-coming star in the police force's narcotics division.

programme.title: Sisterhood
programme.desc: This award-winning film delves into same-sex relationships with its depiction of the romance between two women in Macau. Starring Gigi Leung, Fish Liew & Jennifer Yu.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: An affluent young man decides to carry on his father's legacy by establishing the Mr McDreamy Training Academy with four suitable recruits - to hilarious results.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb threats is causing fear in Hong Kong. An ex-bomb disposal officer becomes prime suspect after a terrorist attack & becomes a fugitive to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Hotel Soul Good
programme.desc: After her boyfriend and job are stolen by her best friend, Mei Qi is hit by a fragment of a meteor, which gives her the ability to see three elderly spirits who need her help to fulfill their last wishes.

programme.title: Sword Master
programme.desc: Director Derek Yee reproduces a 40-year old masterpiece & garners five HKFA award nominations for it. This dazzler stars Lin Geng Xin, Peter Ho & Jiang Yi Yan.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: When the windshield of an airplane shatters at 30,000 feet in the air, the pilot and the crew attempt the impossible. Based on the miraculous landing of Sichuan Airlines flight 8633.

programme.title: Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: A legendary demon hunter tracks down beasts that enter the human dimension, assisted by a lawman protege and a motley crew of friendly monsters.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: When a school bus driver is injured after risking his life to save a boy during an accident, the boy's father invites him to live with them. However, disturbing facts soon begin to emerge.

programme.desc: A local Camaro club has brought in a few stock Camaros. One gets modified for the track, the other the street.

programme.desc: Ryan and the WCC crew work the cars for the rich and famous. They reach for the stars and please the wealthy as they transform junk into living jewels.

programme.title: Misfit Garage S1 Ep10
programme.desc: FU Garage must deal with the aftermath of the demolished '69 Chevy Pickup.

programme.title: Goblin Works Garage S1 Ep04
programme.desc: The Capri is a much loved coupe but for the Goblin team it's the British muscle car that never quite was.

programme.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Richard, Aaron and the Gas Monkey gang are joined by a crazy Canadian on a lawnmower who jumps a fridge but fails to clear the clothes dryer stacked on top.

programme.title: Kindig Customs S3 Ep05
programme.desc: After 3 years of sitting around Dave gets to work fixing up a 1972 Chevrolet Blazer he purchased to build and sell.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers S1 Ep06

programme.title: Dallas Car Sharks S2 Ep13

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars S9 Ep06

programme.title: Goblin Works Garage S1 Ep03
programme.desc: The series two A Land Rover is loved the world over, but the Goblin team change that iconic shape forever as they 'slam it to the weeds'.

programme.title: All Girls Garage S7 Ep16

programme.desc: Ian demonstrates how to stretch a JK 10 inches. He'll cut the frame in half, add an extension and show how to stretch the Jeep body in the process.

programme.desc: Joe is world renowned for building badass motorcycles, but on this build, he's pushing his engineering chops to the limit.

programme.desc: This week at auction Frank, Ash and JD battle it out to see who will take home the best Ford Mustang.

programme.desc: An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.

programme.desc: A brilliant medical engineer and a veteran astronaut go on a seemingly routine spacewalk that ends up in a huge disaster.

programme.desc: An ancient relic disappears from Carlos' dig, Tracker and Skye must find the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger fakes a toe injury to win a race so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep102
programme.desc: All the bees in the Central Forest are captured by Sir Steel for their honey and Deer Squad have to come to their rescue!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep113
programme.desc: All of Calvin's slime has gone off! ROBO G helps him create a fresh batch with a Super Slime Machine! But when the machine goes crazy, Calvin has to use his PLAY POWER to save the day.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep114
programme.desc: A sudden power failure leaves ROBO G critically low on battery and the kid cave in virtual darkness. It's up to Calvin to use his PLAY POWER to fix the Mega Power Maker and get ROBO G fully charged up!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky and Paddington tries his best to teach him tricks. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington accidentally gets stuck to Mr. Curry! // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy play imaginary games but Meteo thinks they are for little kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep324
programme.desc: The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people tell her she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep325
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep326
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep402
programme.desc: Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S4 Ep402
programme.desc: Learn all about manners with the Guppies, as Molly helps aspiring princess Demanda get polite in time for the Glitter Games! Will they become true princesses together?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. We also learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat for fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep406
programme.desc: When a little bunny gets trapped on top of a melting glacier, Blaze must put his new robot powers to the test as he races to the rescue.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase.

programme.title: Roket Kertas
programme.desc: Kisah sahabat baik, Aman dan Amin yang kudung kakinya cuba hidup seperti kanak-kanak lain. Dia sentiasa bersama kawan baiknya Aman yang juga mempunyai cita-cita yang sama iaitu ingin menjadi juruterbang.
